GamepadHapticActuatorEffects.summary: NOTE Experimental The effects read-only property of the interface returns an array of enumerated values representing the different haptic effects that the actuator supports.
GamepadHapticActuatorEffects.value:
An array representing the supported haptic effects. Possible included values are:
NOTEIf an effect is not listed that is known to be supported by the hardware, it may be that the browser does not support playing effects of that type.
